channel.title: Need help making a server! (need it noob laungauge)
channel.description:
Well i understand most of it but here is my assumed knowledge of it..
i have java 5.0 i have jdk 6u1 i have hamachi i have a source <- mimescape pk
I don't know what to do... here is the step-by-step that i know so far.
[b]Get source > download source > extract source to desktop > compile server > run server.[/b] anything missing there? please help.

item.title: Need help making a server! (need it noob laungauge)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Here we go from great speller to noob language.

TRANSFORM!

u got 2 change all de nams 4rm mimescape 2 ur scape compile den run.

TRANSFORM BACK!

Got that?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making a server! (need it noob laungauge)

item.title: Need help making a server! (need it noob laungauge)
item.dc:creator: @KillerbeeWon KillerbeeWon
item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

  1. Go to client
  2. hit ctr + h
  3. Type in find ‘mimescape’ replace with ‘your server name’
  4. Hit find
  5. Hit replace

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making a server! (need it noob laungauge)

item.title: Need help making a server! (need it noob laungauge)
item.dc:creator: @KillerbeeWon KillerbeeWon
item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

You would need to modify your server. Change all the names in the client to the name of the server you want. Compile, run. Make your updates, add tuts. So on. Did you already port foward?

Read full topic
